content: neck ribbing the set-up round marks a single stitch at both center front and center back and the remaining stitches are reserved for the sleeves the raglan increases are worked at each end of the front and back sections every round inside the markers the front and back increase by 2 stitches each every round while the sleeve stitch count remains unchanged take care that the markers do not migrate underneath the adjacent yarnovers into the wrong position after completing the yoke the lower body is worked in the round down to the lower edge which is finished with k2 p2 ribbing the held stitches of the sleeve openings are finished with k2 p2 ribbing in the round the directions refer to front and back for the purpose of identifying the parts as you work but the shaping is identical and can be worn with either side in front ©2023 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 summer sweater ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy directions divide for body and sleeves neckband next round removing prev m as you come to them using smaller ndl co 136 136 136 136 144 144 152 transfer 79 79 79 79 87 87 95 95 sleeve sts to waste 152 sts pm indicating eor and join for working in the yarn use the backwards loop method to co 3 5 6 8 8 round being careful not to twist sts 11 13 14 sts for half of underarm pm for new eor co 2 4 6 8 8 10 12 13 more underarm sts k107 115 123 work in k2 p2 ribbing until piece meas 75 2 cm 131 143 151 159 167 front sts transfer 79 79 79 79 87 87 95 95 sleeve sts to waste yarn co 5 9 12 16 16 next round set up k3 m1 k7 7 7 7 3 3 3 3 m1 21 25 27 sts for second underarm k107 115 123 131 k6 6 6 6 5 5 4 4 8 8 8 8 12 12 16 16 times m1 143 151 159 167 back sts tknit the first 3 5 6 8 8 11 k7 7 7 7 3 3 3 3 m1 k3 first sleeve pm m1 pm 13 14 co sts again to end at eor m near center of first front k3 m1 k7 7 7 7 3 3 3 3 m1 k6 6 6 6 5 5 underarm 224 248 270 294 318 344 368 388 sts 4 4 8 8 8 8 12 12 16 16 times m1 k7 7 7 7 3 3 3 3 m1 k3 second sleeve pm m1 sl eor m back 160 body 160 160 160 176 176 192 192 sts 79 79 79 79 87 work in st st for 6 5 16 5 cm or 75 2 cm less than 87 95 95 sts for each sleeve and 1 st each for front and desired length back hem yoke change to smaller ndl change to larger
